name: paper-progress

properties.name: value
properties.description: The number that represents the current value.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The number that indicates the minimum value of the range.

properties.name: max
properties.description: The number that indicates the maximum value of the range.

properties.name: step
properties.description: Specifies the value granularity of the range's value.

properties.name: ratio
properties.description: Returns the ratio of the value.

properties.name: secondaryProgress
properties.description: The number that represents the current secondary progress.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: True if the progress is disabled.
